abstract: Turkey's offensive against Kurdish militants is one of its largest military operations in years, with 10,000 troops backed by warplanes pursuing rebels in southeastern Turkey and northern Iraq.
snippet: Turkey’s offensive is one of its largest military operations in years, with 10,000 troops backed by warplanes pursuing rebels in southeastern Turkey and northern Iraq.
lead_paragraph: Turkey’s offensive is one of its largest military operations in years, with 10,000 troops backed by warplanes pursuing rebels in southeastern Turkey and northern Iraq.

headline.main: Turkey Deploys Thousands in Pursuit of Kurdish Rebels
headline.print_headline: Turkey Deploys Thousands In Pursuit of Kurdish Rebels
headline.seo: Turkey Deploys Thousands of Troops Against P.K.K.
